title: K-Farm International Secures Major Export Deal for Virus-Free Seedlings
summary: Our specialized tissue culture laboratory has signed an agreement to export 100,000 virus-free wasabi seedlings to Southeast Asia.
content: K-Farm International is proud to announce its first major export agreement for our high-quality tissue culture seedlings. This deal marks a significant milestone in our mission to lead the global wasabi revolution...

title: New AI-Driven Harvest Robot Successfully Deployed
summary: The latest generation of our autonomous harvesting robot has achieved a 99.9% success rate in field tests.
content: In collaboration with global Ag-Tech leaders, we have successfully integrated advanced tactile feedback sensors into our harvesting robots, ensuring zero-damage to the delicate wasabi rhizomes...
